name: Sterling Silver "OM" Handstamped Statement Necklace with Fleur Des Lis Charm
description:
Sterling Silver "OM" Handstamped Statement Necklace with Fleur Des Lis Charm

Hangs in harmony on an 18" sterling silver chain.

During meditation, when we chant Om, we create within ourselves a vibration that attunes sympathy with the cosmic vibration and we start thinking universally. The momentary silence between each chant becomes palpable. Mind moves between the opposites of sound and silence until, at last, it ceases the sound. In the silence, the single thought—Om—is quenched; there is no thought.  Such is the immeasurable power of Om.
